snippet: SNIDER--Edward. The Board of Trustees and the staff of the National Museum of American Jewish History, Philadelphia, mourn the passing of our devoted supporter since our founding. Through Ed's leadership and vision, the Museum built the Only in America Gallery/Hall of Fame, honoring extraordinary Jewish Americans who have changed the world. Ed's legacy at the Museum will live on and inspire generations to come. Heartfelt condolences to his daughter Lindy, Museum Trustee, and the entire family. May his memory be a blessing. Ivy L. Barsky, CEO and Gwen Goodman Director Phil Darivoff and Ron Rubin, Co-Chairmen of the Board 1/3
